meanings.definition: A device or tool used to apply a substance or material
meanings.sent1: The applicators for paint made the job much easier.
meanings.sent2: She bought a set of applicators to help with her art projects.
meanings.sent3: The applicators decided to have a race to see who could apply the glue the fastest.
meanings.sent4: His fingers were like tiny applicators, carefully spreading the jam on the toast.
meanings.sent5: The applicators resembled small brushes, perfect for precise application.

meanings.definition: A person who applies or administers something
meanings.sent1: The applicators at the salon were skilled in hair coloring.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the best applicator of bandages in the first aid team.
meanings.sent3: The applicators at the ice cream shop had a friendly competition on who could scoop the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was an applicator of knowledge, always sharing interesting facts with her friends.
meanings.sent5: The applicators of sunscreen at the beach ensured everyone was protected from the sun.
